Name: Black Oud
Description: Black Oud-Unisex - 50ML. Rich, Warm, Smoky. Indulge in a seductive blend of velvet rose, rich oud, and mysterious leather. This opulent fragrance is a captivating statement for unforgettable evenings.

Name: Cherry Noir
Description: Cherry Noir - Unisex - 50ML. Sweet, Fruity, Woody. Cherry Noir is a captivating fragrance that evokes the essence of midnight in bloom. A modern interpretation of classic allure, this scent is a seductive blend of dark fruit and intoxicating florals.
Middle Notes: Plum, Turkish rose, Jasmine, Sour Cherry
Base Notes: Tonka bean, Vanilla, Cinnamon, Sandalwood, Cloves, Patchouli, Vetiver

Name: Empress Charm
Description: Empress Charm-Womens-50ML. Fruity, Floral, Modern. A vibrant blend of blackcurrant, citrus, and opulent rose. This captivating fragrance unfolds into a warm, sensual base of vanilla, patchouli, and sandalwood. A timeless scent for any occasion. Perfect for day or night, Empress' Charm leaves a lasting impression.

Name: Lychee Sunset
Description: Lychee Sunset - Unisex - 50ML. Fruity, Exoctic, Fresh. Bask in the glow of Lychee Sunset, a scent where bright lime and lychee meet soft lotus and magnolia, unfolding into warm notes of tea, sandalwood, and amber. An exotic blend that lingers like a perfect sunset.

Name: Magnolia Magic
Description: Magnolia Magic-Womens-50ML. Citrusy, Floral, Musky. Capture springtime in a bottle. Zesty orange and sweet pea burst into a floral heart of peony, rose, and peach. Finished with a soft musk, this fragrance is pure enchantment. Perfect for daytime wear, Magnolia Magic captures the essence of a springtime garden in full bloom.
Middle Notes: Pink Peony, Damask Rose, Apricot, Peach, Jasmine

Name: Millionaire Aura
Description: Millionaire Aura-Mens-50ML. Citrusy, Woody, Earthy. Unleash your inner tycoon. A rush of citrus and mint explodes into a fiery heart of cinnamon and rose. Finished with a seductive blend of amber, leather, and patchouli, this fragrance is pure power. Sophisticated and alluring, this complex fragrance is perfect for day or night.

Name: Mystic Oud
Description: Mystic Oud-Mens - 50ML. Smokey, Woody, Luxurious. Embark on a sensory journey. This opulent fragrance blends exotic woods and spicy warmth. Rich oud is the heart of this captivating scent, surrounded by smoky, sensual notes. A final touch of sweet vanilla creates a truly unforgettable experience. Unique and sophisticated, Mystic Oud leaves a distinctive memory, day or night.

Name: Oud Night
Description: Oud Night - Unisex - 50ML. Woody, Fruity, Floral. Unveil your nocturnal allure. Rich oud and zesty citrus ignite intrigue, leading to a heart of opulent rose and earthy patchouli. A smoky leather base with hints of wood and musk creates an unforgettable night-time enchantment. The Oud Night is perfect for evening or night, leaving a sophisticated and alluring impression.
Base Notes: Leather, Sandalwood, Amber, Guaiac Wood, White Musk

Name: Oudmazing
Description: Oudmazing - Unisex - 50ML. Exotic, Luxurious, Sweet. Unexpected luxury. Smoky oud meets juicy fruit in a bold opening. A sensual heart of jasmine and patchouli leads to a warm, leathery finish. This is oud redefined. Unique and alluring, Oudmazing leaves a sophisticated, unforgettable impression, day or night.
Top Notes: Oud, Fig, Pear, Sicilian Orange, Sicilian Bergamot
Base Notes: Grapes, Madagascar Vanilla, Leather, White Musk

Name: Peachy Paradise
Description: Peachy Paradise - Unisex - 50ML. Opulant, Fruity, Warm. A playful blend of peach and citrus leads to an intoxicating heart of rum and cognac, infused with honeyed sweetness and floral elegance. This sophisticated fragrance finishes with a warm, sensual base of patchouli, vanilla, and woodsy notes. This complex and sophisticated fragrance, with a touch of vibrancy, leaves a lasting impression, day or night.
Base Notes: Indonesian Patchouli Leaf, Vanilla, Sandalwood, Tonka Bean, Labdanum, Vetiver

Name: Smoke N Vanilla
Description: Smoke N Vanilla - Unisex-50ML. Smoky, Vanilla, Earthy. A vibrant blend of grapefruit and cardamom leads to a sophisticated heart of earthy vetiver. Finished with a creamy vanilla and tonka bean, this fragrance is a captivating contrast. Smoke N Vanilla is ideal for daytime wear or adding a touch of sophistication to evening occasions.

Name: Tobacco Spice
Description: Tobacco Spice - Unisex - 50ML. Addictive, Seductive, Spicy. Ignite your senses with a fiery blend of spice and smoke. A vibrant burst of citrus and pepper leads to a warm, exotic heart. Rich tobacco and leather create a powerful, sensual finish. This unique and complex fragrance, perfect day or night, leaves a lasting, alluring impression.

Name: Twilight
Description: Twilight - Unisex - 50ML. Fruity, Spicy, Sweet. A mesmerising blend of sweet and unexpected. Juicy pear and sparkling pepper lead to a captivating heart of coffee and jasmine. Finished with creamy vanilla and earthy woods, this fragrance is a twilight dream. This unique fragrance, perfect day or night, leaves a sophisticated and intriguing impression.

Name: Velvet Rose & Oud
Description: Velvet Rose & Oud - Unisex - 50ML. Floral, Woody, Luxury. Indulge in opulence. Rich Turkish rose and spicy clove intertwine with a touch of praline. The heart reveals the depth of smoky oud and rose absolute. A luxurious base of amber, patchouli, and sandalwood completes this timeless masterpiece. Perfect day or night, leaves a sophisticated and enigmatic impression.

Name: Black Oud Beard Oil
Description: Black Oud-Beard Oil-30ml. Elevate Your Beard to New Heights. Unlock a world of refined grooming with our Luxury Beard Oil. Benefits: Luxurious hydration, Deep conditioning, Healthy growth. Organic botanical blend: Jojoba, avocado, sweet almond, and apricot kernel oils. The 3% fragrance infusion is a carefully composed fragrance blend designed to create an aura of irresistible charm, leaving an indelible impression wherever you go.

Name: Tobacco Spice Beard Oil
Description: Tobacco Spice - Beard Oil-30ml. Elevate Your Beard to New Heights. Unlock a world of refined grooming with our Luxury Beard Oil. Benefits: Luxurious hydration, Deep conditioning, Healthy growth. Organic botanical blend: Jojoba, avocado, sweet almond, and apricot kernel oils. The 3% fragrance infusion is a carefully composed fragrance blend designed to create an aura of irresistible charm, leaving an indelible impression wherever you go.

Name: Peachy Melody
Description: Peachy Melody Crystal Infused Candle: A Symphony of Sweet Serenity. Unwind to a sweet symphony. This blissful blend of peachy perfection is infused with crystals for ultimate relaxation. Discover the beauty of Peachy Melody today.

Name: Oceanic Infusion
Description: Oceanic Infusion Crystal Infused Candle: Dive into Tranquility. Escape to the seaside. This calming blend captures the ocean's serenity. Infused with genuine crystals.
Middle Notes: Lavender, Lily of the Valley, Rose, Jasmine

Name: Citrus Spice
Description: Citrus Spice Crystal Infused Candle: A Zesty Elixir of Bliss. Ignite your senses with a zesty blend of citrus and warm spices. Infused with genuine crystals.

Name: Gardenia Dream
Description: Gardenia Dream Crystal Infused Candle: A Fragrant Oasis of Tranquility. Immerse yourself in a blooming oasis. This enchanting blend captures the essence of a fragrant garden.
Base Notes: Jasmine, Pine wood, Lily of the valley
